step3.note: We have already selected the most secure models for you.

step6.title: You have the choice.
step6.description: Do you want to use a European model (maximum performance) or an open-source model with lower performance but increased security?
step6.euHighlightDesc: With Mistral you benefit from outstanding performance while your data stays entirely in Europe.
step6.ownHighlightDesc: Open-source models offer maximum security but come with noticeable limitations in result quality.

step7.title: Your account is ready. Privacy-first with the European model Mistral.
